Rahul Tiwari

Architect / Tech Lead with 15 years of experience specializing in designing, developing, and leading Android mobile application projects. Deep expertise in Android frameworks, architecture, and building high-impact apps for fintech, social media, healthcare, and consumer domains.

Project Highlights

Markk
Social platform for sharing and discovering local experiences and recommendations.
Walnut (axio)
Popular SMS-based money management app for tracking expenses, budgeting, and bill reminders. 1Cr+ downloads.
FedEx Mobile
Official FedEx app for tracking shipments, managing deliveries, and accessing FedEx services on mobile.
S-ICD programmer
Medical device programming tool for Boston Scientific’s S-ICD system, supporting cardiac device management.
Ninja sales pro
Internal solution for sales teams to monitor, enhance, and analyze digital partner engagement and productivity.

Skills

  • Android Development
  • Kotlin
  • Java
  • Android Jetpack
  • Jetpack Compose
  • AOSP
  • JavaScript
  • HTML
  • Play Store
  • Firebase
  • UPI Integration
  • Gemini
  • Copilot
  • MVVM
  • MVP
  • MVI
  • Clean Architecture
  • Mobile Security
  • GIT
  • Jira
  • Jenkins
  • CI/CD
  • Agile / Scaled Agile
  • Leading Teams
  • Mentoring & Training
  • Designing apps

Educational Background

  • PG Diploma in Wireless and Mobile Computing, C-DAC ACTS, 2009
  • Bachelor of Engineering in Electronics and Communication, Rajiv Gandhi Technical University, 2004–2008

Interests

  • 3D modeling and printing
  • Mechatronics

Work History

Android Architect at Turtlemint (2022 – 2025)

  • Led Android development for Ninja Sales Pro, launching the app in under a month.
  • Architected scalable Android solutions, driving 1.5x partner engagement growth.

Tech Lead at Markk (2019 – 2022)

  • Launched key features, including COVID-19 emergency supply finder (10x adoption).
  • Optimized app size and performance through strategic refactoring.

Senior Android Developer at Walnut (Axio) (2018 – 2019)

  • Delivered major features and improved architecture for the Walnut Android app.
  • Enhanced user experience and reduced APK size.

Technical Specialist at Syntel (2014 – 2018)

  • Led cross functional offshore team for FedEx consumer app.
  • Developed MDM and BYOD solutions for Syntel.

Senior Software Engineer (Android) at Agreeya Mobility (2013 – 2014)

  • Designed and developed Android system apps and worked on AOSP.
  • Built custom call forwarding solutions for dual sim android devices.

Module Lead at Persistent Systems (2009 – 2013)

  • Led app development, and developed Android, Blackberry, and Symbian apps.
  • Developed Interface of S-ICD programmer for Boston Scientific.

Contact Me:

rahultiwari01@outlook.com LinkedIn Stack Overflow X (Twitter) Google Developer
© 2025 Rahul Tiwari

--text: #374151; --chip-bg: #e8f0fe; --chip-hover: #d1e7ff; --header-bg: #374151; --header-text: #fff; --card-bg: #fff; --card-shadow: 0 2px 8px #0001; --border: #e0e0e0; --footer: #888; --link:#2563eb; } .dark-mode { --bg: #181a1b; --text: #d1d5db; --chip-bg: #23272b; --chip-hover: #2c3136; --header-bg: #23272b; --header-text: #e5e7eb; --card-bg: #23272b; --card-shadow: 0 2px 8px #0008; --border: #333a41; --footer: #9ca3af; --link:#4ea1ff; } .dark-mode .org a { color: #4ea1ff !important; } html, body { background: var(--bg); color: var(--text); transition: background 0.3s, color 0.3s; } body { font-family: system-ui, -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, 'Segoe UI', Roboto, 'Helvetica Neue', Arial, sans-serif; line-height: 1.6; } .container, .main-header, .footer { background: none; } .main-header { background: var(--header-bg); color: var(--header-text); transition: background 0.3s, color 0.3s; } .main-header h1, .header-left h1 { color: var(--header-text); } .skills-list li, .highlights-list li, .interests-list li { background: var(--chip-bg); color: var(--text); transition: background 0.3s, color 0.3s; } .skills-list li:hover { background: var(--chip-hover); } .app-card { background: var(--card-bg); box-shadow: var(--card-shadow); border: 1px solid var(--border); transition: background 0.3s, box-shadow 0.3s, border 0.3s; } .footer { color: var(--footer); } /* Borders and other elements */ h2 { color: var(--text); border-bottom: 1px solid var(--border); } .app-title { color: var(--text); } .app-desc { color: var(--text); } .work-entry h3 { color: var(--text); } /* Contact icons */ .header-icon { background: #fff; } .header-icon img { filter: none; transition: filter 0.3s; } .dark-mode .header-icon img { filter: none; } /* End dark mode CSS */ html, body { margin: 0; padding: 0; } body { font-family: system-ui, -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, 'Segoe UI', Roboto, 'Helvetica Neue', Arial, sans-serif; line-height: 1.6; } .container { max-width: 1100px; margin: 0 auto; padding: 0rem 1rem; } .main-grid { display: grid; grid-template-columns: 1fr 1.2fr; gap: 2.5rem 2rem; } .left-col, .right-col { display: flex; flex-direction: column; gap: 1.5rem; } header { text-align: left; margin-bottom: 2rem; } h1 { margin: 0; font-size: 2.5rem; color: var(--text); } h2 { color: var(--text); margin-top: 2rem; margin-bottom: 0.5rem; font-size: 1.3rem; border-bottom: 1px solid var(--border); padding-bottom: 0.2rem; } ul { padding-left: 1.2rem; } .skills-list, .highlights-list, .interests-list { display: flex; flex-wrap: wrap; gap: 0.5rem 1.5rem; list-style: none; padding: 0; margin: 0; } .skills-list li, .highlights-list li, .interests-list li { padding: 0.3rem 0.8rem; border-radius: 1rem; font-size: 0.98rem; display: flex; align-items: center; gap: 0.4rem; } /* Removed hover effect from skills chips */ .skills-list li i { font-size: 0.9rem; } /* Brand-specific icon colors */ .skills-list li .fab.fa-android { color: #3DDC84; } .skills-list li .fas.fa-layer-group { color: #3DDC84; } .skills-list li .fas.fa-shield-alt { color: #FBBC04; } .work-entry { margin-bottom: 1.2rem; } .work-entry h3 { margin: 0 0 0.2rem 0; font-size: 1.1rem;
